price: (Iyo ntumwa) ifite imbaraga (n’urwego rwo hejuru) yahawe na nyiri Ar’shi[1] y’icyubahiro (Allah).
arabic: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ مَكِينٖ
footnotes: [1] Reba uko twasobanuye iri jambo muri Surat ul A’araf, aya ya 54.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: dhī quwwatin ʿinda dhī al-ʿarshi makīnin
